titleStmt.title: Proposals by the governour and assistants of the King and Queen's corporation, for encouraging and carrying on the linnen manufacture in England.
titleStmt.author: Dupin, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: The proposals are to be had at Mr. Nicholas Dwpin [sic] esquire at the said Salisbury Exchange, gratis.,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: royal arms with initials W.3.M2.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Mr. Nicholas Dwpin [sic] esquire at the said Salisbury Exchange, gratis.
